metadata.synopsis: Jaheira repsonds to the news that Stelmane is dead
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_ATeleport to S_WYR_Posthouse_Point_BroadsheetSellerba9e4f9e-5c90-4d76-8bba-5b7be82ed9a2Talk to Silfy and buy a broadsheetRead the broadsheet

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: With Stelmane murdered, the Council has an open seat. How timely.
0.context: NodeContext: Grim, dry. A duke was murdered in a 'random attack' at just the time Gortash wanted to step in and claim a Ducal title.
